about_the_game:
That special time of the year! Customize your truck and some of your trailers with a choice of Christmas paint jobs!

Paint schemes included:

  • Magic Ribbons
  • Santa's Bag
  • Xmas Spirit
  • Full Steam Santa
  • Clockwork Reindeer
  • Gift Time
  • Santa Trucker
  • Night of Wonders

All of these themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations. Three of these paint jobs (Clockwork Reindeer, Full Steam Santa, Santa Trucker) are also applicable to some of the in-game ownable trailers.
detailed_description:
That special time of the year! Customize your truck and some of your trailers with a choice of Christmas paint jobs!

Paint schemes included:

  • Magic Ribbons
  • Santa's Bag
  • Xmas Spirit
  • Full Steam Santa
  • Clockwork Reindeer
  • Gift Time
  • Santa Trucker
  • Night of Wonders

All of these themes are applicable to any in-game truck except for 8x4 chassis configurations. Three of these paint jobs (Clockwork Reindeer, Full Steam Santa, Santa Trucker) are also applicable to some of the in-game ownable trailers.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class
  • recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably with ETS2)
  • Hard Drive: 400 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 760-class
  • recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably with ETS2)
  • Hard Drive: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8+ (Mountain Lion)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT-class equivalent
  • Hard Drive: 400 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.8+ (Mountain Lion)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class or better
  • Hard Drive: 400 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class
  • DirectX®: 10
  • Hard Drive: 400 MB available space
  • Sound: DirectX compatible

short_description: That special time of the year! Customize your truck with a choice of six Christmas paint jobs including Magic Ribbons, Santa's Bag, Xmas Spririt, Gift Time, Santa Trucker, and Night of Wonders.
supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Norwegian, Swedish, Hungarian, Czech, Romanian, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Bulgarian, Greek
